item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description:
Immich-iCloud 1.1.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix uploads failing with HTTP 400 due to incorrect multipart Content-Type header
  • Fix 401 on upload — API key is now validated during Test Connection
  • Fix Sparkle error on launch when EdDSA key is not configured
  • Add Done button and Escape key to close Help Guide window

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
Immich-iCloud 1.1.0

Sync Engine

  • Retry with exponential backoff (configurable max retries)
  • Concurrent uploads via TaskGroup (1-5 simultaneous)
  • Checkpoint/resume — pick up where you left off after interruption

Automatic Sync

  • Scheduled auto-sync at configurable intervals
  • Auto-sync on app launch and system wake
  • Pause/resume scheduler controls

Menu Bar & Notifications

  • Menu bar icon with sync status (idle/syncing/error)
  • Quick actions: Sync Now, Open App, Quit
  • macOS notifications on sync complete/failure
  • Dock badge showing upload progress

Keyboard Shortcuts

  • Cmd+1-6 for tab navigation
  • Cmd+Shift+S to start sync
  • Cmd+. to cancel sync
  • Cmd+R to refresh

Filtering

  • Filter by media type (photos, videos, or all)
  • Favorites-only filter
  • Album-based filtering (include or exclude specific albums)

Onboarding

  • 5-step setup wizard for first launch
  • Guided server connection, Photos permission, and sync settings

Auto-Update

  • Sparkle integration for automatic update checks
